name: (2022AU-1-2) Islander
description:
Coconuts everywhere!? Alone on an island, you must gather all the coconuts at your own peril. Avoid the green men (cactus guys) and collect the scattered coconuts to win!

Controls are simple: 

WASD keys to move,  move the mouse cursor left or right to control the camera, P for pause, SPACEBAR to jump, and to exit: pause, then click on red X in the upper right corner.
